Believe it or not, I got sick of eating pork legs, snails and tapas made out of unintelligible sea creatures on my trip to Catalonia.  I never thought I would say this, but switching gears and grabbing some Asian fast food was a breath of fresh, and not oniony, air.I hope this chain finds its way deep in the heart of American cites -and deep into the arteries of American hearts- soon.  It was great.  You get to pick your type of noodles, protein, sauce, veggies, fixins' etc., and they fry it all up right there in front of you, wrap it in a box and give it to you so you can walk around and eat it with sticks.  Well, perhaps I'm not articulating this well enough, but trust me, it's good.
